tweets.author: 鳴潮攻略@GameWith
tweets.text:
Lynette and Monyie's materials have been released!  
Since most of them are new materials, it looks like we'll have to gather them after the Ver3.0 implementation!  
For the weekly boss materials, they're for Innocent and Hecate, so let's go ahead and collect those!

【The Game Awards (TGA) 2025 Players' Voice】
【PlayStation® Partner Awards 2025 PARTNER AWARD】

Linne's CV is Marina Inoue!  
(As a Hoyoverse user who's heard it for dozens of hours, you'll notice right away)
